name: DIS.TORTION: In Sensu
description:
Challenge your fears  in the skill based rhythm-game  DIS.TORTION: In Sensu

Shoot with an enormous speed through a distorted world full of bizarre obstacles. Forward is your only option. The interplay between the weird soundscape and a brute artstyle creates a special atmosphere that haunts you till the end.

Don‘t let your fears overcome you!

The Official Gameplay Trailer of DIS.TORTION: In Sensu !

We recommend to play this game with an Controller!

EPILEPSY WARNING!

We are TEAM JUCAJORO !

Our team consists of four game design students from the HTW Berlin in Germany. DIS.TORTION is our 3. Semester Project !

For more information and details on our : 

  • concept
  • sound
  • visuals
  • game design
  • level design
  • vfx & shader

 feel free to take a look into our project book of DIS.TORTION: In Sensu !
